backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining access control, user approval, product/contact types, estimate structures, and admin-protected mutation/query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark palettes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app, PWA metadata, and app icons.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, cache cleanup, and network‑first fetch logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, profile checks, dashboard rendering, PWA prompt, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI component showing an access‑denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminBackupModul: Provides UI for exporting data to a JSON file and importing backups, including confirmation dialogs and query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/AdminPasswordMod: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Wraps the main app layout with header, mobile navigation, and focused overlay handling.
frontend/src/components/BillingModule.ts: Handles listing estimates, recording payments, managing branding, and syncing estimates to IndexedDB.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothPrinter: Displays a dialog describing Bluetooth printer requirements and supports printing a formatted info page.
frontend/src/components/ChangePasswordMo: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ContactsModule.t: Manages viewing, adding, editing, and deleting contacts with dialog forms and pending amount calculations.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Shows high-level stats for products and contacts, including stock value, low stock count, and category summaries.
frontend/src/components/EstimatePrintVie: A dialog component for printing estimates with browser or Bluetooth printers, including thermal preview settings and encoding logic.
frontend/src/components/FinanceModule.ts: Displays finance reports with filters and printing support, pulling data for products, contacts, estimates, purchases, and transactions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing branding, external link, and version info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header handling authentication, desktop navigation, and mobile menu toggle.
Inventory management UI for viewing, searching, and updating product stock levels with admin checks.
frontend/src/components/InvoicePrintView: Empty placeholder file for invoice printing.
Mobile navigation drawer rendering module links and closing on selection.
frontend/src/components/MobileNumberModa: Empty placeholder file for a mobile number modal.
frontend/src/components/ModulePageHeader: Reusable header component for module pages with title, subtitle, icon, and optional actions.
frontend/src/components/PriceOverrideDia: Confirmation dialog showing loss details when selling below cost and requiring admin override approval.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNavigatio: Renders top or sidebar navigation with module switching and optional admin‑only items.
frontend/src/components/ProductAutocompl: Product search and selection popover with guarded selection handling and filtered results.
frontend/src/components/ProductsModule.t: Full CRUD interface for managing products, including list display and admin‑restricted add/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Mandatory setup modal allowing authenticated users to save their display name.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseModule.t: Complete purchase management UI with line items, profit checks, override prompts, and admin controls.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Shows a deferred install prompt for the PWA, handling dismissal, timing, and installation events.
frontend/src/components/SetAdminPassword: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/SortControls.tsx: UI controls for selecting a sort field and toggling ascending or descending order.
frontend/src/components/ThermalReceiptPr: Renders a styled thermal receipt preview using estimate data and adjustable layout settings.
frontend/src/context/FocusedOverlayConte: Provides context for managing active overlays and locks body scroll while overlays are active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBluetoothThermalPr: Hook for connecting to, managing, and printing to a Bluetooth thermal printer with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements a hash-based routing system with parsing and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login logic, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, roles, products, and backups.
frontend/src/hooks/useThermalQuickPrevie: Manages thermal preview settings with localStorage persistence and supports updates and reset to defaults.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, Radix overlay z-index rules, and thermal receipt print/preview styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Controls module switching and focused routes for the dashboard based on hash routing and user role, rendering appropriate modules within an AppShell.
frontend/src/pages/EstimateEditorPage.ts: Implements create/edit estimate workflow with form state, line items, customer selection, validation, and focused overlay handling.
frontend/src/pages/EstimatePrintPreviewP: Loads estimate print data, renders a thermal receipt preview, and supports browser and Bluetooth thermal printing with Unicode detection.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays login UI using Internet Identity with descriptive cards for system features and roles.
frontend/src/types/web-bluetooth.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type definitions for Web Bluetooth APIs missing from standard libs.
frontend/src/utils/backupFileIO.ts: Exports IndexedDB data to a JSON backup file and restores it by parsing, converting BigInt fields, clearing stores, and writing records back.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDbClient.ts: Provides a wrapper around IndexedDB with schema-defined stores and methods for opening the DB, reading, writing, batching, and clearing data.
frontend/src/utils/purchasePrice.ts: Finds the latest matching purchase for a product and returns its selling price or a fallback price.
frontend/src/utils/sort.ts: Contains generic comparison helpers for strings, numbers, bigints, dates, and a utility to sort filtered lists.
frontend/src/utils/thermalQuickPreview.t: Defines thermal receipt preview settings and generates CSS styles for on-screen preview and print formatting.
frontend/src/utils/thermalReceiptEncodin: Builds ESC/POS command bytes to print structured thermal receipts using text, alignment, formatting, and layout helpers.
Renders a thermal receipt to a canvas and converts it into raster ESC/POS bitmap data for printing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with fallback, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, border radii, animations, and loading plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, issues, and ERP-style billing module feature set including estimates, invoices, inventory, and payments.
